How many characters are there in the game?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): How many characters are there in the game?
By Psychotic Elf on Friday, February 17, 2006 - 04:55 pm:

How many characters are there in the game? I am putting together a quick reference guide, not a walkthrough. They're way too long and there's too many of them, I'm just making something short & sweet. So far I have Holly, Ayase, Bint, Bolzoi, Chamois, Crow, Francesca, Mardoc,Talt, Aroma, Zest, The Peddlar, Dr. Kohak, Hunter, Gavin, Geras, Pabs, Canute/Magda, & Tesca. I think I have them all, but I also think I might be missing 1 or 2. Does the regular Dr. (the one that does check-ups)have a name?

By Thorr on Wednesday, May 13, 2009 - 06:01 am:

Dr Kohak is the Surgeon.
